TopicTitle: About how many hours are you on the forum per day?

Articles.Content:
It's just supposed to be an informal poll. Reply however you see fit, and post your answer below if you want!

If your time is not listed, just choose whichever option is closest.

My answer was based on the time which I have the site open and the amount of time I actually spend looking at it.

I'm on about 5 hours per 24 hour day.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-17T01:10:54Z" title="04/17/2015 01:10  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 17, 2015</time> by Dman979**
Are you talking about on as actually browsing/posting, or just having it open in another tab?

I tried to answer any questions in my original- now edited- post. But feel free to ask more if you need answers! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

On average, probably 3-5 per day.

"Hello, my name is Starwhip, and I'm a KSP-Forum addict."

And I'm more-or-less back up and running here. Life blew over faster than expected. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Let me be the first to welcome you back!

About 1-2 minutes a day.

I need to focus on my studies and other ambitions. My cousin graduated from a South Korean scientific high school (which is almost impossible to get into in the first place, since they only accept the top 0.01 % of middle school graduates in all of South Korea) a year early then went on to graduate from KAIST (The Korean MIT/Caltech). Apparently, she did some research relating to military programs, quantum tunneling, AI, quantum physics, etc. There's no way I'll be as smart as her, but there's no fracking way that'll stop me from my medical/business aspirations until I succeed.

I must get into Williams...

Having ADHD doesn't help much...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-17T04:51:32Z" title="04/17/2015 04:51  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 17, 2015</time> by andrew123**

I'm probably closer to two and a half, depending on the day. I usually check the Forum each morning, check before I go to bed, randomly during the day, and I have at least 2 class periods where I do next to no classwork as I complete my work pretty quickly. Fortunately these classes have computers, so I can usually pull most of the hour on the forums!
